heading: I am already registered in @state_name and need to change my information.
body: Report a change to registration information, such as name, address, or political party.

Review the steps below to understand what to expect. You can use this tool to register for the first time or report a change of name, address or political party to your election office. 

  • @iconConfirmEligible

    Make sure you meet registration eligibility requirements

    Review the requirements below and confirm your eligibility to begin.

  • @iconCompleteForm

    Take 5-10 minutes to answer a few questions

    You'll be asked to enter your name, address and identification information. If you do not have valid state identification, you may still use this form.

  • @iconCheckmark

    Confirm all information is correct and print

    Make sure your information is correct and make any necessary edits. Once you confirm, this tool will generate a mail-in form. You'll want to print or download the form immediately. Vote.gov does not store your information.

  • @iconSendForm

    Sign and mail to your election office

    Don’t forget these last steps! You will need to sign and mail the form to your state office. We’ll provide the address; you provide the first-class postage.

heading: I am registering in @state_name for the first time.
body: Register for the first time in this state. We recommend having your driver’s license or non-driver identification number available.
